title: Exponential Distribution
text: We need to find $$P\left(X>25\right)$$ with given information $$m=\frac{1}{20}$$

title: Exponential Distribution
text: Since $$P\left(X<x\right)$$ $$=$$ $$1-e^{\left(-m x\right)}$$, then we can use $$P\left(X>x\right)=1-1-e^{\left(-m x\right)}$$ $$=$$ $$e^{\left(-m x\right)}$$. Remember that m is our decay parameter respective to the problem that we are facing.
